name: Mantis Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Heal 3 ranks.

sections.text: You gain one additional Stunning Fist attempt per day. While using this style, you gain a +2 bonus to the DC of effects you deliver with your Stunning Fist.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You have learned to target vital areas with crippling accuracy.
